questions.question: How do I reset my domain password?
questions.answer: Use the Password Self-Service portal or contact IT Helpdesk at it-support@company.com. Ensure your new password meets complexity standards.

questions.question: Can I install new software on my laptop?
questions.answer: Only IT-approved software from the company catalog may be installed. Submit a request via the IT service desk for new applications.

questions.question: What should I do if I suspect a phishing email?
questions.answer: Do not click on any links. Report the email immediately through the ‘Report Phishing’ button in Outlook or contact the Security Operations Team.

questions.question: Are USB drives allowed on company devices?
questions.answer: Personal USB drives are not permitted. Use only encrypted company-issued drives for data transfer.

questions.question: What are the password complexity requirements?
questions.answer: Passwords must be at least 12 characters long and include a mix of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols. Passwords expire every 90 days.

questions.question: How do I connect to the company VPN?
questions.answer: Download the VPN client from the IT portal. Use your domain credentials and multi-factor authentication to log in securely.

questions.question: Can I access office files from home?
questions.answer: Yes, access is available through the secure VPN. Ensure you follow data security guidelines while working remotely.

questions.question: What is the company policy on BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)?
questions.answer: Personal devices may be used only if enrolled in the company’s Mobile Device Management (MDM) system and meet encryption requirements.

questions.question: How often should I update antivirus software?
questions.answer: Antivirus must update automatically. If disabled, contact IT immediately to restore protection.

questions.question: What should I do if I lose my company laptop?
questions.answer: Report the loss immediately to IT security. The device will be remotely locked and wiped to prevent data breaches.

questions.question: Are company emails monitored?
questions.answer: Yes, email and internet activity may be monitored for compliance and data protection in accordance with company policy.

questions.question: Can I share company data through personal email?
questions.answer: No, sharing corporate data via personal accounts is strictly prohibited and may lead to disciplinary action.

questions.question: How is data backed up?
questions.answer: Critical business data is automatically backed up to secure company servers daily. Do not store work files only on local drives.

questions.question: How do I request access to a restricted folder?
questions.answer: Submit an access request through the IT Service Desk, specifying folder path, justification, and manager approval.
